channel.title: New Xbox 360 will not RROD
channel.description:
[url='https://kotaku.com/5566600/the-new-xbox-360-wont-red-ring']https://kotaku.com/5566600/the-new-xbox-360-wont-red-ring[/url]
it will now RDOD (red dot of death) very smart move M$,trying to disassociate the image of the 360 with the rrod
also
[img]https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/1/1f/Hal-9000.jpg[/img]
be afraid :fffuuu::fffuuu::fffuuu:

item.title: New Xbox 360 will not RROD
item.dc:creator: jerry
item.description:
russilker:

Actually, no, IIRC the internal hardware has been changed significantly. Most importantly is that the GPU and CPU have been combined into a 45nm, cooler-running multipurpose chip, and the cooling design of the system has really been improved.

Still doesn’t change the fact that Wii < 360 < golden shit < ps3 < PC

That means less rrods!(or rdods) but not if you manage to drop it in the floor.

Read full topic

item.title: New Xbox 360 will not RROD
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
It will PROD.
Purple Ring Of Death.

Read full topic

item.title: New Xbox 360 will not RROD
item.dc:creator: jerry
item.description:
Same hardware, different case + wifi and bigger hard drive. They probably just removed the power button and installed an invisible touch sensor.

I am perfectly fine with the 360 elite.

Read full topic

item.title: New Xbox 360 will not RROD
item.dc:creator: NickAVV
item.description:
Actually, the power icon in the center of the circle will still turn red. Red dot of death, or RDoD.

Read full topic

so, it won’t RROD anymore, It’ll just stop working, amirite?

item.title: New Xbox 360 will not RROD
item.dc:creator: Stuntz
item.description:
Bluemen230:

Wait wait wait you were reading this from your phone?

Ive been checking out this site also through my Iphone while I was waiting for my computer to be shipped. So, Micro$hit, it only took them about 5 - 6 years to even TRY or PRETEND to fix the RROD. I was suprised they were selling it as the same price as the regular 360’s. The most un-greedy thing ive ever seen them do, which IS too good to be true, other than the larger HDD, woopdy doo. Its, the, Xbox, the only good thing I can think of thats good for it is Gears of War. YES I hate over-rated games, but I do love my blood and gore. So its like taking a Klondike bar from Bill Gates without knocking him out. Yes, thats what I would do for a Klondike Bar.

Read full topic

item.title: New Xbox 360 will not RROD
item.dc:creator: jerry
item.description:
agree.
my opinion is that microsoft should fix that error.
but they still have added 3 years of warranty to it.
and, the rrod has been more fixed with 360 Elite, and the rdod is just a more stylish way of showing that the xbox is dead.

Read full topic

item.title: New Xbox 360 will not RROD
item.dc:creator: Mr.Shadow
item.description:
SURPLUS_NiNjA:

The funny part about that is, look at how well the 360 does even with high failure rates. Sure sometimes Sony makes more quarterly profits (the wii always does but its a different audience). The fact that it can do well and still RROD at the same time speaks wonders for other features of the 360.

Doesn’t change that the Playstation is till better, because it has free intarwebz, as opposed to Xbox live. But enough console wars.

Read full topic
